text.name: info1
text.text: FB Neo or FBN as it is commonly known is an emulator

text.name: info2
text.text: of arcade games, that is, it takes the program code, graphic data, ...

text.name: info3
text.text: from an orginal arcade game and emulate the hardware to make

text.name: info4
text.text: the game run in it's original form. As far as the game is concerned

text.name: info5
text.text: it is running in it's original cabinet. FBN is an open-source project

text.name: info6
text.text: and it is programmed by a group of people known as the FBNeo team.

text.name: info7
text.text: Many of the developers of this project also worked on FB Alpha.

text.name: info8
text.text: FBN is based on FinalBurn and old versions of MAME.
